content:
ResolveComReference Class

In this Article

Implements the ResolveComReference task. Use the ResolveComReference element in your project file to create and execute this task. For usage and parameter information, see ResolveComReference Task.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class ResolveComReference : Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • MarshalByRefObject
  • AppDomainIsolatedTask
  • Microsoft.Build.Tasks.AppDomainIsolatedTaskExtension
  • ResolveComReference

Inherited Members

Log
,
BuildEngine
,
HelpKeywordPrefix
,
HostObject
,
InitializeLifetimeService()
,
TaskResources
,
CreateObjRef(Type)
,
GetLifetimeService()
,
MemberwiseClone(Boolean)
,
Equals(Object)
,

,
GetHashCode()
,
GetType()
,
MemberwiseClone()
,
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
,
ToString()

Remarks

On a 64-bit machine, Framework64/<version>/msbuild cannot resolve COM objects registered as 32-bit components. For example, if you register a COM object with regsvr32 and then try to build a project targeting the x86 platform with Framework64/<version>/msbuild, the build is unable to resolve the COM object. If instead you build with Framework/<version>/msbuild, the build is able to resolve the COM object.

Constructors summary

ResolveComReference()

Initializes a new instance of the ResolveComReference class.

Properties summary

DelaySign

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the ResolveComReference task places the public key in the assembly (true) or fully signs the assembly (false).
EnvironmentVariables

Gets or sets an array of name-value pairs of environment variables that should be passed to the spawned tlbimp.exe and aximp.exe in addition to (or selectively overriding) the regular environment block.
ExecuteAsTool

Property to allow multitargeting of ResolveComReferences: If true, tlbimp.exe and aximp.exe from the appropriate target framework will be run out-of-proc to generate the necessary wrapper assemblies.
IncludeVersionInInteropName

When set to true, the typelib version will be included in the wrapper name. Default is false.
KeyContainer

Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.
KeyFile

Gets or sets an item that contains a key pair.
NoClassMembers

Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to pass the TypeLibImporterFlags flag to .tlb wrapper generation.
ResolvedAssemblyReferences

Gets or sets the resolved assembly references.
ResolvedFiles

Gets or sets the fully qualified files on disk that correspond to the physical locations of the type libraries that were provided as input to this task.
ResolvedModules

Gets or sets the paths to the modules that were found.
SdkToolsPath

If ExecuteAsTool is true, this must be set to the SDK tools path for the framework version being targeted.
Silent

Gets or sets a flag specifying whether messages or warnings are logged. Default is false, messages and warnings are logged.
StateFile

Gets or sets the cache file for COM component timestamps.
TargetFrameworkVersion

The project target framework version. Default is empty. which means there will be no filtering for the reference based on their target framework.
TargetProcessorArchitecture

Gets or sets the name of the preferred target processor architecture, which is passed to the tlbimp.exe /machine flag after translation, for example x86, ia64, amd64 or msil.
TypeLibFiles

Gets or sets the type library file path to COM references.
TypeLibNames

Gets or sets the type library names to resolve.
WrapperOutputDirectory

Gets or sets the location on disk where the generated interop assembly is placed.

Methods summary

Execute()

Executes the ResolveComReference task.

Constructors

  • ResolveComReference()

    Initializes a new instance of the ResolveComReference class.

    public ResolveComReference ();

Properties

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether the ResolveComReference task places the public key in the assembly (true) or fully signs the assembly (false).

    public bool DelaySign { get; set; }

      true if the ResolveComReference task places the public key in the assembly; false if the ResolveComReference task fully signs the assembly.

  • EnvironmentVariables

    Gets or sets an array of name-value pairs of environment variables that should be passed to the spawned tlbimp.exe and aximp.exe in addition to (or selectively overriding) the regular environment block.

    Property Value

    • String[]

      Returns an array of name-value pairs of environment variables.

  • ExecuteAsTool

    Property to allow multitargeting of ResolveComReferences: If true, tlbimp.exe and aximp.exe from the appropriate target framework will be run out-of-proc to generate the necessary wrapper assemblies.

    public bool ExecuteAsTool { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      To be added.

  • IncludeVersionInInteropName

    When set to true, the typelib version will be included in the wrapper name. Default is false.

    public bool IncludeVersionInInteropName { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      To be added.

  • KeyContainer

    Gets or sets a container that holds a key pair.

    public string KeyContainer { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      A container that holds a key pair.

  • KeyFile

    Gets or sets an item that contains a key pair.

    public string KeyFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      An item that contains a key pair.

  • NoClassMembers

    Gets or sets a Boolean value that specifies whether to pass the TypeLibImporterFlags flag to .tlb wrapper generation.

    public bool NoClassMembers { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the task should pass the TypeLibImporterFlags flag to .tlb wrapper generation; otherwise, false.

  • ResolvedAssemblyReferences

    Gets or sets the resolved assembly references.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ResolvedAssemblyReferences { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The resolved assembly references.

  • ResolvedFiles

    Gets or sets the fully qualified files on disk that correspond to the physical locations of the type libraries that were provided as input to this task.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ResolvedFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The fully qualified files on disk that correspond to the physical locations of the type libraries that were provided as input to this task.

  • ResolvedModules

    Gets or sets the paths to the modules that were found.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] ResolvedModules { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The paths to the modules that were found.

  • SdkToolsPath

    If ExecuteAsTool is true, this must be set to the SDK tools path for the framework version being targeted.

    public string SdkToolsPath { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      To be added.

  • Silent

    Gets or sets a flag specifying whether messages or warnings are logged. Default is false, messages and warnings are logged.

    public bool Silent { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      Returns the flag.

  • StateFile

    Gets or sets the cache file for COM component timestamps.

    public string StateFile { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The cache file for COM component timestamps.

  • TargetFrameworkVersion

    The project target framework version. Default is empty. which means there will be no filtering for the reference based on their target framework.

    public string TargetFrameworkVersion { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      To be added.

  • TargetProcessorArchitecture

    Gets or sets the name of the preferred target processor architecture, which is passed to the tlbimp.exe /machine flag after translation, for example x86, ia64, amd64 or msil.

    public string TargetProcessorArchitecture { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      Returns the name of the preferred target processor architecture.

  • TypeLibFiles

    Gets or sets the type library file path to COM references.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] TypeLibFiles { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The type library file path to COM references.

    Remarks

    This property may contain item metadata. For more information, see the section "TypeLibFiles Item Metadata" in ResolveComReference Task.

  • TypeLibNames

    Gets or sets the type library names to resolve.

    public Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem[] TypeLibNames { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • ITaskItem[]

      The type library names to resolve.

    Remarks

    This property may contain item metadata. For more information, see the section "TypeLibFiles Item Metadata" in ResolveComReference Task.

  • WrapperOutputDirectory

    Gets or sets the location on disk where the generated interop assembly is placed.

    public string WrapperOutputDirectory { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • String

      The location on disk where the generated interop assembly is placed.

Methods

  • Execute()

    Executes the ResolveComReference task.

    public override bool Execute ();

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if task execution succeeded; otherwise, false.
